location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, Currently at Tehran, to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter concerns the apparent capture of British boats by Joasimese [Āl Qāsimī] pirates, to the north of Bombay. William Bruce states that, following his return to Bushire, he will proceed to Rasil Khima [Ra's al-Khaymah], in order to remonstrate with the tribe.
